.. _wx.Endianness:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.Endianness**
==========================================================================================================================================



The `Endianness` enumeration provides the following values:



================================================================================ ================================================================================
**Description**                                                                  **Value**
================================================================================ ================================================================================
``wx.ENDIAN_INVALID``                                                            returned on error                      
``wx.ENDIAN_BIG``                                                                4321                      
``wx.ENDIAN_LITTLE``                                                             1234                      
``wx.ENDIAN_PDP``                                                                3412                      
``wx.ENDIAN_MAX``                                                                
================================================================================ ================================================================================

|
